meanings.definition: Without a house or permanent residence.
meanings.sent1: The houseless man slept on a park bench.
meanings.sent2: Many houseless families seek shelter in homeless shelters.
meanings.sent3: The houseless cat found a cozy spot under the porch.
meanings.sent4: The houseless wanderer roamed the streets like a lost soul.
meanings.sent5: The houseless children huddled together for warmth in the cold night.

meanings.sent1: She felt houseless after losing her apartment.
meanings.sent2: The houseless refugees were in need of temporary housing.
meanings.sent3: The houseless puppy was adopted by a kind family.
meanings.sent4: The houseless tree stood alone in the middle of the field.
meanings.sent5: The houseless nomads traveled from place to place in search of a home.
